about_the_game:
"Avian Knights" is an exhilarating, feather-fuelled experience that combines classic arcade-style gameplay with vibrant modern-day design. The game harks back to the golden era of cooperative gaming, revitalizing the nostalgia of couch co-op with the ability to engage in 8-player local multiplayer battles.

Each player becomes a valorous knight soaring through fantastical landscapes atop their trusty avian steed. Whether engaged in swift solo flight or hectic multiplayer skirmishes, the air will ripple with the thrilling whoosh of wings and the clatter of clashing weapons.

The gameplay of "Avian Knights" offers an abundance of variety. Knights can wield an array of weapons, each with unique mechanics and strategic opportunities. Mighty swords, agile bows, powerful magic staves, and more are at your disposal. Collecting power-ups in mid-flight will add an extra layer of strategy and unpredictability, offering boosts that could turn the tide of any battle.

The integration of the Major League eSports app brings an innovative layer to "Avian Knights," enabling cross-platform leaderboard tracking and achievement gathering. Compete for the title of the most formidable Avian Knight, or strive to unlock the most prestigious achievements, and watch as your feats echo across all gaming platforms.

Whether you're looking for a casual gaming session with friends or a heated competitive battle against fellow knights, "Avian Knights" is sure to provide an addictive, fun-filled gaming experience.

This game promises to keep you and your friends coming back for more, seeking to perfect your flight skills, master your weaponry, and ascend to the top of the leaderboards. "Avian Knights" is more than a game – it's an invitation to a world of aerial knightly battles, where bravery, strategy, and skill determine the victors. So, gather your friends, choose your birds, arm your knights, and let the battle of the skies commence!

Features

  • 1–8 Player Arena Mode
    Test your mettle against your friends in the chaotic arena mode! Boasting game modes such as Last Team Standing, Deathmatch, Jailbreak, and more, there are plenty of ways to play! Feathered Frenzy supports up to 8 player multiplayer, so no one is left out of the action!
  • 1-2 Player Co-op Arcade Mode
    Looking for a real challenge? Hop into Arcade mode to battle against wave after wave of enemies while competing for the World High Score! Bring a friend along and battle against enemy knights and bosses while avoiding the hazards of each level! Get through all 256 waves of enemies and be crowned the Jousting Heroes Champion!
  • Major League eSports App
    Expand your experience by creating an Alan-1 account and downloading the MLES (Major League eSports) app! Track your high scores, accumulate league points, make friends, form teams, compete in tournaments and more! Each Alan-1 game released will be eligible for competition in the Alan-1 league with great prizes available for those who perform best!
  • High Scores
    Experience the classic arcade experience of competing for prestige on the high score leaderboard! With an integrated global high score leaderboard linked to your Alan-1 account, your best scores will be automatically tracked and updated to show your standing amongst other players around the world.

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 16.04+
  • Processor: 2 GHz 64-bit (x64)
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 1GB
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
  • Sound Card: N/A
  • VR Support: N/A
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Ubuntu 16.04+
  • Processor: 3 GHz 64-bit (x64)
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 4GB
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
  • Sound Card: N/A
  • VR Support: N/A

short_description: Battle it out with your friends or compete for the title of Grand World Champion in Avian Knights, the crazy game of mounted mayhem combat! Featuring an 8-player competitive arena mode, a classic arcade co-op mode, and tons of weapons and power-ups, there’s plenty of ways to play!
supported_languages: English, French, Italian, German, Czech, Dutch, Hungarian, Japanese, Korean, Norwegian, Polish, Portuguese - Portugal, Romanian, Russian, Spanish - Latin America, Swedish, Traditional Chinese, Turkish
